subject: Television
Profanity
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Television microphones treated viewers to an intimate conversation between a victorious Lindsey Vonn and her husband, but also picked up expletives from Shaun White’s coaches.
snippet: Television microphones treated viewers to an intimate conversation between a victorious Lindsey Vonn and her husband, but also picked up expletives from Shaun White’s coaches.
